forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain, then rain in the afternoon. High of 64F. Winds from the SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain, then rain in the afternoon. High of 18C. Winds from the SSE at 5 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 50F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 60% with rainfall amounts near 0.2 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 10C. Winds less than 5 km/h. Chance of rain 60% with rainfall amounts near 6.1 mm possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain in the afternoon. High of 64F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain in the afternoon. High of 18C. Winds less than 5 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain. Low of 50F. Winds from the South at 5 to 10 mph shifting to the East after midnight. Chance of rain 80% with rainfall amounts near 0.3 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain. Low of 10C. Winds from the South at 5 to 10 km/h shifting to the East after midnight. Chance of rain 80% with rainfall amounts near 8.4 mm possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy with rain. High of 63F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy with rain. High of 17C. Winds less than 5 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening, then overcast. Low of 45F. Winds from the NNE at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening, then overcast. Low of 7C. Breezy. Winds from the NNE at 15 to 20 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High of 68F. Winds from the NNE at 5 to 15 mph shifting to the WNW in the afternoon.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low of 45F. Winds less than 5 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low of 7C. Winds less than 5 km/h.
